title: Understanding the First Quartile
text: The first quartile references the 25th percentile. We note that the percentage of data values that are less than or equal to the 25th percentile is 25%.

title: Determining Directionality
text: Based on this connection between the first quartile and the 25th percentile, since the first quartile for time it took to finish the exam was 35 minutes, does that equate to 25% of people finishing the exam in 35 minutes or less OR 35 minutes more?
